Unit 4002
Assignment 1

Task 1: Power systems analysis
Use the matrix to discuss sample and power data.
a) Analyse the matrix below.
i) Explain source quality.
ii) Compare rows with sample data.
iii) Comment on power conversion.
iv) Summarise findings.
b) Provide recommendations.
c) Include assumptions.
d) Mention operating range.
e) Explain test boundaries.
f) Provide evidence.
g) Confirm safety controls.
h) Describe reporting approach.
i) Include references.
j) Final conclusions.

Sample  Power  Voltage
S1  100  12
S2  150  24

Task 2: Reflection
Summarise lessons learned.
